products.name: Professional Laptop 15"
products.description: High-performance laptop with Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Perfect for professionals and content creators.

products.name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse
products.description: Comfortable wireless mouse with precision tracking and long battery life. Reduces wrist strain during extended use.

products.name: RGB Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: Premium mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and Cherry MX switches. Perfect for gaming and typing.

products.name: 4K Ultra HD Monitor 27"
products.description: Stunning 4K resolution monitor with HDR support and 144Hz refresh rate. Ideal for gaming and professional work.

products.name: HD Webcam with Microphone
products.description: 1080p webcam with built-in noise-canceling microphone. Perfect for video calls and streaming.

products.name: Wireless Gaming Headset
products.description: Immersive surround sound wireless headset with comfortable ear cushions and long battery life.

products.name: Extended Gaming Desk Mat
products.description: Large desk mat with smooth surface and non-slip base. Protects your desk and enhances mouse movement.

products.name: USB-C Hub 7-in-1
products.description: Versatile USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and power delivery. Essential for modern laptops.

products.name: Aluminum Laptop Stand
products.description: Adjustable laptop stand improves posture and cooling. Made from premium aluminum with anti-slip pads.

products.name: Desktop Speakers 2.0
products.description: Compact desktop speakers with rich sound quality and USB power. Perfect for small spaces.
